Coffee n’Coke Community Journal

A notebook written by @coffeencoke which includes notes on software development and product design.

If you have something to contribute, let me know.

Coffee n’ Coke, combine iced espresso, cream, and Coca-Cola.

Breifly About Myself

  • I work at Amazon as a Software Development Engineer for Alexa.
  • I live in Seattle, WA.
  • My lovely wife is a wedding, anniversary, and adventure photographer
  • I love making ideas come to life, hiking, gardening, cocktails, history, traveling (especially Italy), corgis, and above all else my awesome family.
